name: Pensionskassernes Administration A/S
membership: Forsikring og Pension, Energy Solutions, IIGCC, UNPRI
goal: PKA administrates pensions for app. 320.000 members in Denmark. The members primarily work within the healthcare sector. PKA is a jointly owned administration company for four pension funds. As well as aiming to create member value PKA also invests in projects and assets, which have high environmental, social and governance standards.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Fraud prevention, Taxation, Transport
euInitiatives:
Pensionmatters: Solvency II
Financial regulation: EMIR, climate policies, long term investment and capital market union.
